hero.subtitle: Access elite R&D talent and strategic expertise through a verified corridor, aligned with Qatar's National Vision 2030.

about.label: About
about.title: ResearchGuide
about.subtitle: An On-Demand Expertise Platform & Tech Scouting Hub.
about.description: ResearchGuide is an innovative solution designed to strengthen the innovation and R&D ecosystem by creating a verified corridor between Africa and the Gulf. Our mission is to import targeted scientific skills and global strategic knowledge, perfectly aligned with the pillars of Qatar's National Vision 2030, particularly human and economic development.
about.hybridSubtitle: We have combined the best elements of global leaders to create a solution tailored to the specific requirements of the Gulf market:

hybridItems.title: Execution Flexibility
hybridItems.desc: Maximum responsiveness to quickly meet your expertise needs.

hybridItems.title: B2B Trust
hybridItems.desc: Rigorous vetting guaranteeing access to the top talents.

hybridItems.title: Scientific Specialization
hybridItems.desc: Specifically targeting PhDs and niche researchers.

hybridItems.title: Elite Strategic Advisory
hybridItems.desc: Secure access to decision-makers and market vision.

about.corridorDesc: We start with this strategic axis to validate the quality of academic vetting before regional expansion. Morocco offers a pool of high-quality scientific talent, often bilingual (Arabic/English/French), while Qatar has a strong demand for expertise for its large-scale projects.

problem.challengeTitle: Innovation in Qatar faces a critical dual challenge
challenges: Access to Emerging Knowledge: difficulty in quickly identifying and validating Tech Scouting solutions in AI, Renewable Energies and Smart Cities.
Qualified Resources for Execution: urgent need for flexible scientific workforce (PhDs, Engineers) at competitive cost.
solutions: A Verified Skills Corridor between Africa and the Gulf.
On-Demand Expertise aligned with Qatar's National Vision 2030.
A robust ecosystem connecting Morocco's scientific pool to Qatar's sovereign entities.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: A Unique Hybrid Model
services.subtitle: We combine execution flexibility, B2B trust, scientific specialization, and elite strategic advisory for a complete solution.

items.title: Certified Talents
items.desc: A pool of PhDs, researchers and senior engineers rigorously selected through a five-step process.

items.title: Elite Strategic Advisory
items.desc: Rapid access to global strategic knowledge and decision-makers for technology due diligence.

items.title: Flexible R&D Execution
items.desc: Scientific workforce for data analysis, modeling and engineering at competitive costs.

items.title: Compliance & IP
items.desc: Secure contractual framework ensuring intellectual property assignment and quality standards (SLA).

process.label: The "Vetted" Label
process.title: A 5-step selection process
process.subtitle: Only the best candidates join our elite network.

steps.title: Academic Verification
steps.desc: Validation of degrees, publications and research track record.

steps.title: Technical Assessment
steps.desc: In-depth skills testing in the targeted area of expertise.

steps.title: B2B Case Study
steps.desc: Simulation of a real mission to assess execution capability.

steps.title: Cultural Fit
steps.desc: Interview evaluating adaptability and cross-cultural communication.

steps.title: Contractual Verification
steps.desc: Legal compliance, IP and SLA commitment.

items.title: Vetted Label
items.desc: Rigorous 5-step verification ensuring academic excellence, technical mastery and cultural reliability.

items.title: IP Compliance & Security
items.desc: Strict contractual management including Intellectual Property assignment to secure your investments.

items.title: 72h SLA Guarantee
items.desc: Commitment to rapid expert replacement within 72 hours if the profile doesn't match your expectations.

items.title: Bilingual Service
items.desc: Dedicated support in Arabic and English for cultural mediation and smooth project management.

items.title: Research Showcase
items.desc: An exclusive feature allowing Elite clients to discover the next wave of emerging technologies.

items.q: How do you guarantee expert quality?
items.a: Each talent goes through a five-step vetting process: academic verification, technical assessment, B2B case study simulating a mission, cultural fit interview and contractual verification.
Security is our priority. All our talents sign a framework agreement including full IP assignment to the client upon project validation.

items.q: What if an expert doesn't fit?
items.a: Thanks to our SLA commitment, we guarantee an equivalent replacement within 72 hours to minimize any risk of work interruption.

items.q: What areas of expertise are covered?
items.a: We focus on strategic R&D pillars: AI, Renewable Energies, Smart Cities and complex engineering.
We ensure total financial security with guaranteed payment within 7 days after deliverable validation.
